package step4;

public class MyThread extends Thread {
	private int num;
	
	public MyThread() {
		this(0);
	}
	
	public MyThread(int num) {
		this.num=num;
	}
	
    public void run() {    	
    	int result = 1; 
		for(int i=1;i<=num;i++)
            result*=i;
    
        try {
			Thread.sleep(20);
		} catch (InterruptedException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
    	System.out.println(result);
    }
}
